article_title: In final State of the Commonwealth address, Beshear says Kentucky 'back with a vengeance'
article_text: Democratic Gov. Steve Beshear gave his eighth and final State of the Commonwealth address to lawmakers Wednesday night, boasting of the progress Kentucky has made since he took office and delivering his wish list for the 2015 General Assembly.

Steve Beshear gave his eighth and final State of the Commonwealth address to lawmakers Wednesday night, boasting of the progress Kentucky has made since he took office and delivering his wish list for the 2015 General Assembly.
